com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration.loader

Interface IConfigurationLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationLoader, ConfigurationLoaderBase

    public interface IConfigurationLoader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Checks whether the current runtime configuration is reloadable, and throws an ConfigurationChangeForbiddenException is not.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(Name parentName)
        Load the object(s) specified by parentName.
        Parameters:
        parentName - Name of parent of configuration(s) to load.

      • reload

        void reload(Name name)
        Reload the object(s) specified by name. After each reload the responsibility of the loader is to mark all configuration objects affected by the reload as 'have been loaded' and 'have not changed since last reload'
        Parameters:
        name - MessageRuleSetLoader name parameter. Each loader has different interpretation of this parameter

      • analyseNewConfiguration

        void analyseNewConfiguration(Map<ReloadedObjectCategory,Set<Name>> reloadCatageories,
                             ConfigurationObjectRegistry newConfigRegistry,
                             boolean forceReload)
        Analyze the configuration in the specified configuration registry and classify objects of this loader according their reload-ability characteristics
        Parameters:
        reloadCatageories - Classification of objects according their reload-ability characteristics
        newConfigRegistry - configuration to compare with the current one
        forceReload - TBD

      • reloadNewConfiguration

        void reloadNewConfiguration(Map<ReloadedObjectCategory,Set<Name>> reloadCatageories,
                            ConfigurationObjectRegistry newConfigRegistry,
                            boolean forceReload)
        Reloads the configuration supplied vianewConfigRegistry parameter.
        Parameters:
        reloadCatageories - Classification of objects according their reload-ability characteristics
        newConfigRegistry - configuration to reload
        forceReload - TBD

      • analyseCurrentConfiguration

        void analyseCurrentConfiguration(ConfigurationChanges delta,
                                 Set<Name> nonReloadableSessions)
                          throws ConfigurationChangeForbiddenException
        Checks whether the current runtime configuration is reloadable, and throws an ConfigurationChangeForbiddenException is not.
        Parameters:
        delta - changes we want to apply
        nonReloadableSessions - Sessions which are currently in a non-reloadable state. TODO FG 4/6/10: we should not need to pass this in, the loader should be able to figure it out by itself, otherwise we are just passing the burden onto client code which should not care about reload/reloadability logic.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationChangeForbiddenException - if this configuration cannot be changed

      • setMainLoader

        void setMainLoader(ConfigurationLoader configurationLoader)
        Set the reference to the main loader.
        Parameters:
        configurationLoader - the reference to the main loader
